text: Long stories! So long! From a page! Oh, the day when men know all men to extend a spark to the sun that a man gives concentrated in a spark; the day when we realize that nothing has size, and that therefore, enough is enough; the day when we realize that nothing is worth anything by its dimensions - and thus ends the riddle that Micromegas saw and that I see every day - and that a book can be reduced to the hand of an ant because it can expand the idea and make it the universe! FIN
title: Cuentos largos
author: Juan Ramón Jiménez
